Title: Empowering care teams with Dragon Copilot, an AI clinical assistant | BRK372
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how Microsoft Dragon Copilot, an AI clinical assistant, simplifies and transforms care team workflows, streamlines documentation, surfaces information, and automates tasks. Designed with role-based experiences at its core, Dragon Copilot delivers tailored capabilities for the broader care team. Its integrated and extensible design ensures seamless interoperability with EHR systems, AI apps, and agentsâ€”enabling organizations to scale innovation without disrupting workflows.
